us.zoom.sdk

Interface MobileRTCVideoViewManager


  • public interface MobileRTCVideoViewManager
    Meeting MobileRTCVideoView manager class. Get the manager object by the interface in MobileRTCVideoView to add/remove/clean up video units.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add an active video unit to the MobileRTCVideoView.

      Add video preview unit to the MobileRTCVideoView.
      boolean addShareVideoUnit(long userId, MobileRTCRenderInfo renderInfo)
      Add a shared video unit to the MobileRTCVideoView.

      Remove active video unit from the MobileRTCVideoView.

      Remove all attendees' video units from the MobileRTCVideoView.

      Remove all video units from the MobileRTCVideoView.

    • Method Detail

      • addPreviewVideoUnit

        boolean addPreviewVideoUnit(MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Add video preview unit to the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        renderInfo - Render information for video unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo.
        Returns:
        If API calls it successfully. Only one preview video unit can be added in a MobileRTCVideoView.

      • updatePreviewVideoUnit

        void updatePreviewVideoUnit(MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Update preview video unit render information in the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        renderInfo - New render information of the video preview unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo.

      • removePreviewVideoUnit

        void removePreviewVideoUnit()
        Remove video preview unit from the MobileRTCVideoView.

      • addActiveVideoUnit

        boolean addActiveVideoUnit(MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Add an active video unit to the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        renderInfo - Render information for the video unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo.
        Returns:
        If API calls it successfully. Only one active video unit can be added in a MobileRTCVideoView.

      • updateActiveVideoUnit

        void updateActiveVideoUnit(MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Update active video unit render information in the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        renderInfo - New render information of the active video unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo.

      • removeActiveVideoUnit

        void removeActiveVideoUnit()
        Remove active video unit from the MobileRTCVideoView.

      • addAttendeeVideoUnit

        boolean addAttendeeVideoUnit(long userId,
                             MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Add the specified attendee's video unit to the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of user whose video will be added to the MobileRTCVideoView.
        renderInfo - Render information for the video unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo.
        Returns:
        TRUE means that the API calls it successfully, FALSE not.

      • updateAttendeeVideoUnit

        void updateAttendeeVideoUnit(long userId,
                             MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Update the specified attendee's video unit render information in the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID of specified attendee.
        renderInfo - New render information for the video unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCVideoUnitRenderInfo.

      • removeAttendeeVideoUnit

        void removeAttendeeVideoUnit(long userId)
        Remove the specified attendee's video unit from the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID of the specified attendee.

      • removeAllAttendeeVideoUnit

        void removeAllAttendeeVideoUnit()
        Remove all attendees' video units from the MobileRTCVideoView.

      • addShareVideoUnit

        boolean addShareVideoUnit(long userId,
                          MobileRTCRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Add a shared video unit to the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        renderInfo - Render information for the video unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCRenderInfo.
        userId - The ID of user who is sharing.
        Returns:
        If API calls it successfully. Only one shared video unit can be added to the MobileRTCVideoView.

      • updateShareVideoUnit

        void updateShareVideoUnit(MobileRTCRenderInfo renderInfo)
        Update shared video unit render information in the MobileRTCVideoView.
        Parameters:
        renderInfo - New render information for the video unit, which is an instance of MobileRTCRenderInfo.

      • removeShareVideoUnit

        void removeShareVideoUnit()
        Remove shared video unit from the MobileRTCVideoView.

      • removeAllVideoUnits

        void removeAllVideoUnits()
        Remove all video units from the MobileRTCVideoView.

      • viewToShareContentX

        float viewToShareContentX(float x)
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate on the phone corresponding to that on the sharing view.
        Returns:
        The x coordinate on the sharing view.

      • viewToShareContentY

        float viewToShareContentY(float y)
        Parameters:
        y - The y coordinate on the phone corresponding to that on the sharing view.
        Returns:
        The y coordinate on the sharing view.

      • shareContentToViewX

        float shareContentToViewX(float x)
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate on the sharing view corresponding to that on the phone.
        Returns:
        The x coordinate on the phone.

      • shareContentToViewY

        float shareContentToViewY(float y)
        Parameters:
        y - The y coordinate on the sharing view corresponding to that on the phone.
        Returns:
        The y coordinate on the phone.
